exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSettingSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="400" height="255" y="310" horizontalCenter="0" source="MoneyBG_png" scale9Grid="28,8,175,51"/>
	<e:Rect width="720" height="1136" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.6" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group width="102" height="94" x="216" y="352" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Button id="btn_music" label="" x="0" y="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_music_png" source.down="btn_music_down_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image id="img_music_disable" width="76" height="72" x="0" y="0" source="btn_disable_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="102" height="94" x="396" y="352" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Button id="btn_sound" label="" x="0" y="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_sound_png" source.down="btn_sound_down_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image id="img_sound_disable" width="76" height="72" x="0" y="0" source="btn_disable_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btn_agree" label="" x="296.5" y="488">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="YesBtn_jpg" source.down="YesBtn1_jpg"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LevelIconSkin" width="77" height="77" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" states="up,disabled" >
	<e:Image width="77" height="77" includeIn="up,disabled" x="0" y="0" source="gs_select_1_png" source.disabled="gs_select_dis_png"/>
    <e:Label id="lb_level" text="100" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneBeginSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="720" height="1136" x="0" y="0" source="GameBG1_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_begin" label="" x="182.5" y="1009">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="StartBtn_png" source.down="StartBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_setting" label="设置" x="474" y="16">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="MoneyBG_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="WordSkin" width="80" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="80" height="80" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xffffff" strokeColor="0x0276d0"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_text" text="字" x="0" y="0" width="80" height="80" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneGameSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image width="720" height="1136" x="4" y="0" source="GameBG3_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" x="24" y="9" width="95" height="77" anchorOffsetX="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="BackBtn_png" source.down="BackBtn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image width="645" height="807" x="39" y="120" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="WordFrame_png" fillMode="scale"/>
	<e:Group id="group_answer" width="367" height="80" x="176" y="468" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="80" height="80" x="0" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="80" height="80" x="95" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="80" height="80" x="190" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="80" height="80" x="285" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="15"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_words" width="463" height="374" y="634" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="65" y="47" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="75" y="57" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="85" y="67" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="95" y="77" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="105" y="87" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="115" y="97" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="125" y="107" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="135" y="117" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="145" y="127" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="155" y="137" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="165" y="147" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="175" y="157" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="185" y="167" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="195" y="177" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="205" y="187" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="215" y="197" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="225" y="207" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="235" y="217" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="245" y="227" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:Word width="80" height="80" x="255" y="237" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="15" verticalGap="15"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="img_question" width="372" height="264" x="172" y="181" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Group id="group_win" width="720" height="1136" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect width="720" height="1136" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image width="632" height="474" x="45.5" y="651" source="Result_png"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_next" label="" x="446" y="1008">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ResultBtn_png" source.down="ResultBtn1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="lb_explain" text="" x="104" y="765" anchorOffsetX="0" width="513" anchorOffsetY="0" height="63" textColor="0x000000"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_from" text="" x="103" y="873" anchorOffsetX="0" width="504" anchorOffsetY="0" height="128" textColor="0x000000"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneLevelsSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Scroller width="720" height="1136" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Group id="group_levels"></e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
    <e:Button id="btn_back" label="" x="598" y="1045">
        <e:skinName>
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
            <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="BackBtn_png" source.down="BackBtn_png" source.disabled="BackBtn1_png"/>
            <e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
            </e:Skin>
        </e:skinName>
    </e:Button>
</e:Skin>
